content.rendered:
AqualisBraemar has a team of master mariners, rig movers, naval architects, structural engineers and geotechnical engineers specialised in rig move business covering independent technical assessment and verification, MWS engineering review, survey attendance and approval for ocean move, in-field move and installation, lay-up and reactivation of rigs.

  • Suitability and Operational Condition Inspection of Marine Spread for Rig Move (Fit for Purpose)
  • Float-On, Dry Transportation & Float-Off of MODU by Semi-Sub Heavy-Lift Carrier
  • Wet Towage Approval of MODU
  • Foundation Assessment, Site-Specific Assessment and Geohazard Evaluation for Emplacement of Jack-Ups
  • Location Approval & Move of Mobile Offshore Drilling Units (MODU)
  • Mooring Analysis and Marine Consultancy for Station Keeping of MODU
  • Lay-up and Reactivation Survey and Approval of MODU
  • Our experience and familiarity with the many aspects of offshore operations is of immense benefit to our clients. Our office and site attendance activities are conducted in accordance with Joint Rig Committee guidance and we cooperate closely with all parties to ensure a successful outcome to an operation. All project managers are accredited Society of Offshore Marine Warranty Surveyors (SOMWS)

jetpack-related-posts.title: Marine Warranty Services
jetpack-related-posts.excerpt: The AqualisBraemar teams of Marine Warranty Surveyors, Engineers and Master Mariners act to protect Underwriters’ interests or self-insured Clients. We provide independent third party review and approval of offshore projects.

jetpack-related-posts.title: Offshore Rig Moving
jetpack-related-posts.excerpt: Our teams are fully experienced with both jack up and floating units. We offer full engineering assessments for site specific location approvals, and provide both Marine Warranty Surveyors and Rigmovers/Towmasters for offshore attendance during rig moves.

jetpack-related-posts.title: Marine Consultancy
jetpack-related-posts.excerpt: AqualisBraemar provide professional offshore & marine consultancy services. Our team of Master Mariners and Naval Architects has extensive experience of a wide range of activities from simple marine operations to challenging and complex offshore projects.
